dialogues.text: How about me? I could be a guardian.  Egg considers then reaches around his neck. The CHAI TAO piece dangles from a gold chain. Egg takes off his neckla steps forward. Steve grins -- thinking it's for him -- an reaches for it. But Egg presents it to KIM.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: What's this? Kim looks at it. The colors ripple in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: It... is meant for you.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: It's beautiful...but...

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: If you are going to act so recklessly you must carry it at all times.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Don't take it, Kim. This is creepy!

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: No, I can't...

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You must!... (He's overstated something, backs off, to save face.) Please...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: But why me? I'm American, not Asian. I want nothing to do with the old ways.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You study martial arts.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: For self-defense.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: But you saw Egg...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Ah...the light was bad. Steve slips in next to her.  63.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Take the piece. Take it. It's the THIRD PIECE OF THE

dialogues.speaker: CHAI TAO
dialogues.text: Kim knows something's going on, but doesn't know quite wh And the piece is very beautiful. Egg grins.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Well... okay. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: No. Thank you. Egg smiles enigmatically, slips away. Kim and Steve look each other and the jade for an awkward moment. It GLOWS a PULSES. It SHIMMERS in her hand.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: It's pretty... but magic powers? I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Then how do you explain this...? He tries a trick; touches the jade, rubs his hands, mumbl incantations, spreads his palms. A flash. He staggers bac

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Holy cow! I almost had it down.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: (contemptuous) That's it? The magic? You're going to go up against “sorcerers” ..with that? Egg returns, smiling...at Steve. He hold ancient texts.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: He thinks he knows everything. Egg makes a quick move, a glowing lotus blossom appears, aissolves into a golden mist.  64.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: How'd you do that?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You know the thing up here? (indicates his head) You must know it down here. He indicates his heart.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: But I do.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You think you do. We shall see. Steve makes the same kind of gesture. A blossom starts to appear. Then dissolves in a poof! Egg is slightly impress

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Now do you believe me?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: No. But I do need all the help I can get. (He smiles. He's kidding. ) Come, grasshopper. We must prepare. He zips through the maze, grabbing a vial here, a lacquer there. Steve hops to follow.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Lung quat; Dragon Bones. Fut show; Buddha's Hand. Mow ngon; Cat's Eye...And...tiger bile. Tannis blossom. Lichee tea.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Tea?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Replaces electrolytes lost fighting demons. Some mandrake root... corn starch for body. Now mix it up. Steve mixes it. Egg drinks. A TRANSFORMATION! He's no lon a wizened old man, but a powerful wizard.  65. Egg turns to Kim. He offers the potion. She ignores it. Steve sneaks a sip.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You deny your heritage?

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: My heritage? Subservience to men... to the old ways?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Ahhhh...yes. You are overly rational. Not a common failing among women.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: (irritated) Thank you. Steve just smiles at Kim...he feels the potion taking eff

dialogues.speaker: KIM, (CONT'D.)
dialogues.text: {to Steve) What are you staring at?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steve spreads his hands. A faint charge flickers between palms. Egg's intrigued. He points to a glowing incense co on his altar to his ancestors.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: If you really believed... one could pick it up in your bare hands ...that is, if you are truly worthy.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: And if not?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Oh, it'll burn the hell out of you. You must have faith... or a comprehensive health plan. Egg looks at Steve critically, gauging his reaction. Steve picks up the fiery ember. Egg's intrigued. Steve glances at Kim, loses concentration, cries out, drops the coal.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Of course, hot coals are a problem for those with short attention spans.  66. Egg picks up the coal, pops it into his mouth, swallows i He burps discreetly. A small flame bursts from his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Excuse me. See, not just faith but heart. Otherwise all you'll wind up with is heartburn. Egg winks at Kim. He knows there is a growing attraction between Steve and Kim. Brad senses it too.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: (testily) Come on.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: We gotta go.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Go?

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: This is not our fight... or whatever it is... I mean, we have a job to do. She looks at Steve.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Oh, that's okay. I'll stay and fight alone. Kim turns, hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Alone? You two against all the forces of Hell?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: That's alright. We can handle it.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: You couldn't handle a Kung Fu move last time I looked.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Thanks for your concern. Bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't think you need help? You don't think he does?

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Come on. They don't need you.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: They need me. They just won't admit it.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Yeah, well, what can you do? A beat as she considers.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I'll stay. You go.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Go? Where am I gonna go? You're my partner, right?

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Even when you're wrong, right?

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Like now, you mean?

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Right. I must be out of my mind, but there's one thing I do know... there's no such thing as magic. Just then, a GIANT FLAME BALL bounds up the street and bu through the windows. The flaming ball roars at them. Stev steps in front of Brad and Kim and catches it in his hand

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: No such thing as magic... eh, Brad?

dialogues.speaker: ACT FIVE
dialogues.text: Steve stands holding the FLAME BALL. His hands FLAME. A ghostly image of Chi Lung appears in the room.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Does it burn and sizzle?!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: No. I like to do this.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Give me the third piece of the Chai Tao or... The FLAMES ROAR. So does Steve.

dialogues.speaker: EGG
dialogues.text: Mind over matter. Mind over matter!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Do you mind? It's my matter.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Help him!

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You must treat the bad magic with contempt. {turns to Kim) You must also believe...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Yes. It couldn't hurt. Kim closes her eyes, concentrates. The jade GLOWS.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: (to Steve) Relate it to something real.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Something real? The last time I was holding a ball of fire. Let's see... it was my birthday cake. I made a wish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make it now. You can do it!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: T can't.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Make a wish!! This gets him. A look of determination crosses his face. Steve stares at his hands burning fiercely. He takes a deep breath and blows with all his might. The flame flickers out. Chi's gone. Egg's pleasantly surprise

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Very good, grasshopper.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: What did you wish for?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Train set. Same as always.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Well, whatever it was, it worked. I'm proud of you.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You mean that?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Yeah, proud as any inscrutable person can be. There may be hope for you two yet.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Yin and Yang. Man and woman. Each incomplete without the other. But when they come together,

dialogues.speaker: BAM
dialogues.text: (He punctuates with a tiny explosion.) You are not one of us, but... you have something. Here... the ancient texts. Maybe if you two work together... They glance at each other awkwardly.  70.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Nothing personal... It... it would just be magic.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: (laughs) Yeah...sure. At Egg's gesture the walls open up to reveal a LABORATORY with potions, flasks, distilling apparatus, magic swords, armor... a distillery and armory of magic. He gathers the Magic Spheres seen earlier.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You've heard of Aladdin's lamp. Well, same thing. The holder of the complete Chai Tao can ask a wish. Chi Lung will ask for ultimate power for evil.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Oh... is that all. Steve's beside himself with excitement. He runs his hands over the books. Then he notices the White Hearts appear. Double Chin looks alert, on guard.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: It's okay, they're with us. Double relaxes a touch...studies Kim, Brad, Steve. A SUDD EXPLOSION. The room rattles..Dust sifts down.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Egg, you better help us. The Flame Lords are tearing the city apart! Suddenly, there's a ruckus outside. They rush to the wind

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flame Lords rush up. Citizens try to fight back, but they no match for the Flame Lords. SCREAMS!

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: White Hearts. Come On! They rush out. Kim follows...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Wait! Wait for the magic! He just doesn't listen... Come on! Egg frantically stuffs the Magic Spheres into a pouch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The White Hearts give chase, followed by Kim, then Brad a Steve. Egg brings up the rear lugging the pouch.

dialogues.speaker: BLIND ALLEY
dialogues.text: The Flame Lords rush in and disappear. The White Hearts follow... then look around... uneasy.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: They're gone. What do we do?

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Prepare to Die!

dialogues.speaker: A MAGICAL IMAGE SHIFT, (OR A CHEAP DISSOLVE)
dialogues.text: The empty alley is filled with Bobby and the Flame Lords demonstrating demonic powers, nasty weapons and bad attitudes. They surround and move in to attack. The Heart are rushed from all sides.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: rushes up with his pouch of magic. He rolls the spheres a the Flame Lords... They burst into shrapnel.

dialogues.speaker: KIM AND BRAD
dialogues.text: fight valiantly, twisting, kicking, leaping. Even Double impressed. But the Demonic Lords are too much. The White Hearts are driven back. A RUSH. The Demons focus on Kim, grab her and drag her of Brad lunges for her, but comes up with just the JADE NECKLACE. A Flame Lord tumbles him into a corner.

dialogues.speaker: EGG
dialogues.text: battles madly, but there are too many. They rush him. He disappears in a pile of writhing demons. His pouch drops. final sphere tumbles out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: makes a grab for the last of the exploding spheres. It ro towards a sewer grating... Steve dives for the sphere. Just as it drops into the sew he intercepts it, tosses it blindly in the Flame Lords' direction. It EXPLODES!

dialogues.speaker: ALLEY
dialogues.text: The dust clears. The demons are gone. So are Egg and Kim. Steve helps Brad up and notices the necklace.

dialogues.speaker: CU
dialogues.text: It glows and throbs powerfully.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE AND BRAD
dialogues.text: They walk off quickly into the dark, spooky night.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE AND BRAD
dialogues.text: Steve's entranced by the jade. Brad is freaking out!

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Jeeshhh! Truck's trashed! Kim's gone. Hey, those were some scary demons! Demons?! My god!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: They took Egg. We gotta find him. And Kim.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Yeah, Kim... I hope she's alright. Hey, how am I gonna explain this to the company?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Do you understand? they kidnapped Kim!

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Yeah, Boy, I hope those demons know what they're doing. They get on the wrong side of her, they'll wish they'd never been born... or whatever demons are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: w They turn into another blind alley and stop. Too late.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You wonder why they took them and not us?

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Should we be insulted?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: It must be the jade.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: What jade? You mean this? Brad reaches for the jade just as four Flame Lords drop d from above. One snatches the jade from Brad and holds it triumphantly. Steve snatches it back and runs.

dialogues.speaker: A CHASE
dialogues.text: Through alleys, tunnels, passages. Steve scampers ahead. The jade holds them off.

dialogues.speaker: CUL-DE-SAC
dialogues.text: Steve breaks into an open area lit by a trashcan fire tha throws scary shadows on the walls. One shadow's a demon. grabs for Steve. He ducks but Brad is caught, dragged off

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: No. Lemme go! You can't do this. I'm in the union!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: turns back to help. He's jumped. They fight. Steve's out- numbered. A Demon stuffs Steve head-first into a trashcan The demonic Lord steps back, pleased with his work.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Chai tao sun! Bong ngor! (Puzzle God, help me!) A BOLT shoots out of the can, enveloping the demon. Steve BLOWN OUT, spinning.

dialogues.speaker: IN MIDAIR
dialogues.text: He rights himself, holds the jade out before him. He land softly, amazing himself as much as the demons. He's singe but okay. He unclenches his fist, notices...  74. cu - STEVE HAND The jade has left a burning imprint.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Ayee yaa! Jun Bong do ngor! (Wow, he really did help me!) The Lord's now just a pile of smoking ash. Steve's alone. studies the jade curiously. It changes color.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Jeezzz. I got ‘em, Brad. (he looks around) Brad?... Where are you? Steve stands in the alley... alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Egg and Kim are imprisoned along with a number of sobbing young girls. Brad is carried in and dumped on his head.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Ooof! Hey, I believe you've just violated my civil rights. You're in big trouble now! The demon LUNGES AND ROARS at him. It curls Brad's hair. rapidly scrambles backward, away.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: And do something about your breath. He catches sight of Egg.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Whew! These guys are kinda lax in personal hygiene. He spots Kim.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Kim...there you are... He looks around.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Kim. Where the hell are we? She looks at Egg.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Not exactly Hell... but close. Egg is calm as a Buddha, but Kim is seething.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: How can you sit there so calmly?!

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: What's wrong?  76.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: What's wrong?! We've been captured by demons, imprisoned with a bunch of whining... young. ..virgins.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Yeah... (eyeing the virgins) virgins.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: And you... Great Wizard! Why don't you do something! Egg looks up from his meditation.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Why don't you!

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Trust the Chai Tao.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Iocan't...I'm not...

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You must! Chi Lung has to face the Judges of Hell. He doesn't have the complete puzzle. He'll stall ... maybe offer them virgin sacrifices for more demons. And to keep them amused.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Yep. That would do it for me.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Sacrifices? Human sacrifices!?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: I'm afraid so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Good thing I'm not a virgin. (Kim glances at him) What are you so mad about? You're off the hook, aren't you? Kim stares at Brad for a beat.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Well... we can't do anything here. Let's find a way out.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: There is no way out.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: There's gotta be... She walks toward a doorway... BLLLZZZT! She's blown back.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: For the first time, The mystic bands are too strong.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: You're a top wizard! Why don't you do something?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You must do it. You must use the Chai Tao. (She stares at him.) ...the jade.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: This...? (reaches for her necklace) It's gone.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Gone?! What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I mean I don't have it anymore. he shows fear.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Then, we are in Big Trouble. a my

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could'a told ya that!

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: {starts to panic) I must've lost it during the fight.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Well the Flame Lords don’t have it.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Steve had it. But the last I saw of him, they had him over a barrel.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: (suddenly hopeful) But he's not here. He's not captured. Maybe he does have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SUDDENLY, A RATTLING ROAR. Chi's LAUGHTER is HEARD. The w SHAKE, start to DISSOLVE.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN, (CONT'D.)
dialogues.text: .I revealed the ancient ways to him. If he evaded the Flame Lords Steve must have the magic well in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MASSIVE EXPLOSION blows out what's left of the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steve sits at the counter, blackened face, shards of a fl in his hand. He looks up at Double Chin.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Too much Ni-Chi!. I'll just add some Yun-sum root. Double Chin's unsure. Steve's too excited to be intimidat He busily mixes potions from Egg's magical ingredients.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Err... what exactly did Egg say to you?  79.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Uh, you know... the magic... it's really a simple thing if you follow the formulas. Of course, you have to believe, have faith and all that.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Did he say anything about talent? ..-You know, a feel for the thing? Steve adds a powder. A small BLAST rattles the windows.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN, (CONT'D.)
dialogues.text: Did he mention liability insurance?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I'm gonna take all this stuff and go and get him and Kim... Maybe Brad.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: You?! Against Chi Lung?! You're just gonna walk in?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: No, I'll take the bus.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: You're crazy! (to White Hearts) Come on, Hearts, let's go. We'll take care of this ourselves! They turn, march out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They emerge to find Steve standing there. Stunned, they t back to shop and see Steve also standing inside. BACK TO EXT. The outside Steve raises his hands parallel to each other Electricity dances between them.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: How'd you know how to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, the Mau Soot! ...the "Two places, One Time”? It's nothing. Ancient hat trick. The White Hearts look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: They got demons, they got most of the Chai Tao. They got Egg Shen. I think you guys can use all the help you can get. He creates a hologram of the jade. It shimmers before the

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: You've learned the magic...

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Yeah. And I've made more of Egg's potion. I think it'll enhance strength and speed. At least that's what it says in the book, here. They look uneasy. He offers it. It bubbles from flask to glass and foams toxically.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Go ahead. The first one's always free.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: (excessively polite) Oh, no. You first. Then Steve's not so sure. He screws up his courage and swallows it. He drinks, stands blinking and burping.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: How d'you feel?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Strong as an ox. (sniff, sniff) ...Same fragrance. Care for a sharpener? He offers the foaming cup. They back away.  At the dare. Double

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You want to grow big and strong like the demons, don't you?

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: How can you know of this?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I'm a quick study.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: No. It's impossible for you to lead us, to learn the magic, the ancient ways... Only Egg Shen can know these things.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Oh? (flips, lands in the same place, TWANGS with energy.) Well, maybe it's because my heart is pure. (A flask blows, showering them with shrapnel.) Then again, maybe not. Maybe I need the jade. Well, you want to have a stranger to save your master? Alone? Against all the forces of Hell? Well? Do ya? grabs the potion, takes it in a gulp.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Well...

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: I think I...feel...something. Hey, I feel great!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: That's just the caffeine. Can you move really fast?

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: How's that?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: How's what?

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: See, really fast.  82. Steve rolls his eyes, but Double turns and high-fives him making a mild thunderclap.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Haiiii Loh! Fat seut do! (Yes, Magical powers! Victory!) He flips, spins, tumbles, darts around the room at incred speed. The White Hearts are clearly seeing double. He's a blur. Then he appears in a flash.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: What do you think?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Looks like happy hour at the espresso bar. Who's next? The White Hearts line up, grab cups.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Potion, potionccino, or potion latte? They take the cups, look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Yuan ho! (Salute!) They ceremonially drink as one. They gulp, smack their li A beat. A BLUR as they flip around the room at double spe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGG SHEN'S BUS creeps through the darkened streets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Steve and the Hearts are wired and jabbering like magpies Double Chin notices the sky above the warehouse.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Shhhhh... Uh oh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sky boils with swirled lightning and dark clouds.  © w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: into Chi Lung's Throne Room. Egg, Kim and Brad and the virgins are transported by Chi's magic and materialize. Chi's more demonic than ever. He grins at the terrified girls, at Egg and Kim.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Ahhh... the thirteen beautiful virgins.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Yeah, practically every one in the Bay Area.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: But WHERE IS THE JADE!

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: The jade? A FORCE BEAM shoots from his hand, grabs Bobby by the thr lifts him off the ground.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: (furious) I told you to get the final piece of the Chai Tao from Egg Shen! Time's running out!

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: He doesn't have it. We looked all over, took his shop apart.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: You... you coward! You traitor! His force field slams Bobby up against the ceiling. Chi releases him, he drops to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Oooof! Overcome with fury, Chi moves on Egg Shen.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Where's the jade, Egg Shen?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: With a worthy mortal.  84.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: I will HAVE THAT JADE! Force beams fly from his hands slamming them all high up the walls!

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: I can't believe it! Henchmen, Demons...Black Magical Powers! (SCREAMS to the heavens!) Is there no one who will BRING ME

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bus idles as the White Hearts survey the perimeter. The JADE NECKLACE dangles from Steve's neck.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Well? Double is apprehensive. Other White Hearts report.

dialogues.speaker: WHITE HEART
dialogues.text: Reinforced gate. Tripwires, interrupter beams. Motion sensors...possibly gas.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: (turns to Steve) What do you think?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I think this calls for something elegant

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: Right. Like what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flame Lords stand guard. Suddenly, THE DOOR SHATTERS, sending them flying. The bus ROCKETS through, filled with screaming White Hearts, SLAMS into a wall and comes to re steaming. Double shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: That... was e ant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought so. You know... in terms of simplicity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Demon Lords are down but not out. They swarm as the W Hearts tumble off the bus. The battle's joined. It's demon versus potion, magic against magic. The demons are horrific and terrifying, slashing the air with their razor claws. The White Hearts are so quick the demons can nail them, can't land a blow. The White Hearts are flippi overhead. They're everywhere. Double Chin flips to get out of a jam and lands in a cach firecrackers. He rubs them together at super speed, sprin out just as they go off in a Technicolor BLAST!. White Hearts fall upon the demons. The White Hearts penetrate further into the hidden domain. Then... the Dem Lords back away. Double warns...

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE CHIN
dialogues.text: No! Wait! Hold up! Too Late! The trap is sprung. The walls DISSOLVE and they are in..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chi Lung's LAUGHTER RINGS IN TRIUMPH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chi cackles in triumph as the Flame Lords get to their fe licking their wounds. A FLASH! A BURST OF PLASMA -- shoot from Chi‘s JADE PIECES -- coalesces as an ENERGY BALL in middle of the room. Chi Lung's LAUGHTER stops as, with a BOOMING ROAR, the JUDGES OF HELL appear. If you thought Y Lo was bad, these guys are worse! Snarling, bad-tempered Demon Monsters, each scarier than the other. They glare a Chi with ill-concealed contempt. He puts on a happy face.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: (mumbles to himself) ..-not quite ready... (then to the judges) Judges of Hell...Welcome! The FIRST JUDGE just SNARLS. Chi's smile freezes. He turn to JUDGE TWO, who is busy MORPHING into something even mo menacing.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Yah, well... Okay then, right to business! Presenting... He spreads his arms like a Master of Ceremonies. The ligh go up, revealing the whole of Chi's work: Thirteen altars appear in a circle. On the altars the sobbing virgins are bound. Among them, shackled to the wall, are Kim, Bobby, and Brad. And, in a GOLDEN HOLDING PEN with AN ELABORATE MAGICAL LOCK, Steve, Double and the White Hearts... and dangling from Steve's neck, the JADE.

dialogues.speaker: CU
dialogues.text: He quickly stuffs it under his shirt before anybody sees.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: What's all this?

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: The virgins? Oh, sacrifices. Down payments on the demons.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Yeah, so what are we doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kind of an honorary thing. You know, you could save yourself, come to the dark side with me.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I - I don't think so. I don't look good in red and black. And you better watch out for yourself. I think he's crazy.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Yeah, well...I was starting to notice that. He stops as he notices Chi getting more demonically grotesque.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Look! He isn't even human anymore. You think he'll let you live when this is over?

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: (shocked at the thought) He'd never...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah? Look at your friends. More Flame Lords stumble in. One is badly wounded and GROANING. Annoyed, Chi Lung turns, lofts a PLASMIC BLAST, BLOWS HIM AWAY. Clumps of demon fur float to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: He glares at the smoking spot, turns back to his guests.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Ahem...Now, the sacrifice will please come to order. GONGS RING. Demons come to attention. The ceremony begins Chi Lung goes to the first young woman, putting his hands her shoulders. She struggles in horror.  88

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: It's alright. It's not even death as we know it. Just the temporary use of your soul. Hardly miss it. Trust me, I know. With glowing eyes, the evil sorcerer starts to pull the girl's soul right out of her body. Her eyes bulge... gree mist drifts out and curls about her head. She struggles a pulls it back.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: That's right, don't make it too easy. He leans in, his eyes glow red, his face morphs into a horrible monster. The Virgin opens her mouth to scream. With a SUCKING SOUND her soul exits her mouth as a column pale green smoke. The girl's soul becomes a bright sphere that floats above her empty head.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: See, if women would just learn to keep their mouths shut.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: (outraged) You... Geu! (pig) Chi Lung turns his awful attention on her. She and Bobby freeze. Chi glares. He takes an interest and moves to her

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: And who is this?

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Ummm, extra added attraction. Kim Fan of the Power Company.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: That's Ms. Kim Fan to you! Chi is pleasantly surprised.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Oh, yes. One of Egg Shen's little proteges. Perhaps, also... a quardian of the jade?  89.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I don't have the jade. Chi turns to Bobby, glaring...

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Did you check?

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: What are we wasting our time for... it's not here, boss. He moves to Kim, grinning. ROAR! Bobby's lifted ina PLASMIC BEAM. He flames for a bit, then drops.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Of course it's here, you idiot!! I can feel its presence! Bring the girl to me!

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Sprawled on the floor, gets wobbily to his feet. He moves Kim.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: (mumbles to himself) I'm an idiot. You're the one going to hell.

dialogues.speaker: KIM AND BOBBY
dialogues.text: Bobby unshackles her.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: He's a monster!

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: This is nothing. You should see when he really loses it.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: (moves to Bobby) You're better than this. You don't belong with him.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: You really think so? (A beat.) Well, I certainly didn't count on this Hell stuff.  90.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: (loudly) You know, you guy's are really Starting to get on my nerves. Chi looks over, BLASTS STEVE. He rolls across the pen tow Brad.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: What did you do that for?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I'm trying to get us all out of here.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: So far you're doing a great job.. Steve notices Egg, still pinned on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Egg!! Can you help us?!

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Not while I'm held here. Not while the jade's lost.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: It's not lost. I got it right here. He holds up the THIRD PIECE OF JADE

dialogues.speaker: CU
dialogues.text: Chi sets the other pieces in an altar. He makes incantati The girls' souls drift above their bodies. Bobby brings a struggling Kim towards Chi.

dialogues.speaker: CEREMONY
dialogues.text: All attention is on the girls' souls. They drift toward t Judges. The Judges look interested.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: I promised you virgins, I gave you virgins...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now... I offer you a bonus. He moves towards Kim. She is clearly not excited about th

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG, (CONT'D.)
dialogues.text: (to Judges) Do we have a deal?

dialogues.speaker: JUDGE
dialogues.text: We make no deals, Chi Lung.

dialogues.speaker: KIM AND BOBBY
dialogues.text: She works on him.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: You think he's going to show any loyalty to you?

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Not so easy to find beauty like this in Hell. Quite a prize. Think about it. Chi's grown uglier, demon-like...hellish.

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: Do not toy with us, Chi Lung. You have a debt to pay... and your time is running out.

dialogues.speaker: THE GOLDEN PEN WITH ELABORATE MAGICAL LOCK
dialogues.text: interwoven with scrolls and icons, dragons, and idiograms Using his knowledge of Chinese artifacts, Steve tries to figure out the magical unlocking formula.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: If I can just figure out these symbols... I might be able to find a way to free us.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Don't try it. They'll kill you.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I didn't think you cared.  A HOWL from the demonic judges of Hell, 0.S.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Well, whatever you're going to do... Do it fast.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: There are symbols... and then there are symbols.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: And you went to college for that? The demonic judges move in, ROARING, HISSING, CLAWING.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: What am I missing?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You must find the answer for yourself.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: That's it!? You got us all into this!! And now you're quoting "The Wizard of Oz"?!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: That's it!! The power is in my hands. I've had it all along. The jade!!

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Now you're catching on, grasshopper. Steve holds the jade to the lock.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: But you cannot do it alone.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: (shouting) Kim!! Help me! The demonic Chi Lung snarles. He approaches Steve.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: So you have the jade!! Give it to me or you will all die!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: {to Steve) What can I do?

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Come on. Remember that phrase your grandmother taught you...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I remember. Of course I remember.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: But you must also believe...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Believe... I do believe... I believe... (demons are moving in) I believe I'm in Big Trouble!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Chai tao sun...do! (Puzzle God...come!) Kim breaks free of Bobby. She runs to the golden cage and reaches through the carved lock. Her finger barely touche the jade...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Chai tao sun, bong ngor!... (Puzzle God, help me!)

dialogues.speaker: BOTH
dialogues.text: Yut chai ho hup! (United in harmony!) The JADE FLASHES! The GATE flies open. A ROAR OF FIRE. The White Hearts tumble out. Flame Lords rush to meet the

dialogues.speaker: THE THRONE
dialogues.text: Chi Lung has completed his change... He's been transforme into an ogre. He turns on them. FLAME balls spew from his hands, his eyes, his mouth...

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: He's terrified. In a flash, he grabs Steve's jade and hol it up.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Here, Chi Lung. I have the jade!  94. He holds it up. Chi sends out a BOLT and grabs it, but Bo hangs on and is carried over to the altar. He drops. Chi glares at him, eyes burning.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: Let them go! Chi Lung! You've got what you want. Chi opens his hand for the jade. Bobby's compelled to release it. Chi grabs the THIRD JADE PIECE, knocks Bobby aside,... and puts all the pieces togeth...

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: No! Steve leaps at Chi Lung and knocks the jade puzzle apart! three pieces fly off in different directions. Chi sends a FIREBALL BLASTING at Steve. He's knocked down, tumbled un the blast. The Flame Lords attack. Double Chin and the White Hearts take them on.

dialogues.speaker: CHI
dialogues.text: He throws a BOLT down at the three pieces of jade. They s across the floor, inexorably drawn back toward Chi Lung.

dialogues.speaker: THE CHAI TAO
dialogues.text: Steve grabs for one piece. He's dragged by it under and through the tumbling combatants.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: leaps for the second piece and gets dragged, kicking...

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: grabs the THIRD PIECE. He is dragged toward Steve and Kim In a few seconds, the Chai Tao will be complete.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Bobby... NO!! Don't let it happen! ! Chi Lung turns his power on Kim. He scorches her with a blast of lightning. She screams in pain.

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: No, Chi Lung!! Let her alone!!  95.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: NO                        ! You worthless toad! ! When I am the Lord of the Universe, I will rid myself of you and your pathetic jabbering. Bobby has had enough. He digs in his heels trying not to the pieces come together but, inch by inch, he's drawn in

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: (shocked) No?i! Bobby heaves his jade toward Steve. It hits and slides. Everyone dives for it. Steve gets there first.

dialogues.speaker: CHI
dialogues.text: is furious! A magic sword appears. He SLASHES though Bobb Blood spatters onto the field that imprisons Yen Lo.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: slams the two jade pieces together.

dialogues.speaker: ...COME TOGETHER. POOF
dialogues.text: Yen Lo appears full-sized and disgruntled. He waves the smoke away. He towers over the terrified Chi Lung.

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: Judges... the time limit has expired. Your duty is clear. They turn to Chi.

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: No! I got you virgins. Look at all the trouble I caused. Hell would be nothing without guys like me! Chi takes Kim as a hostage... and grabs the THIRD CHAI TA PIECE from her hand. Steve lunges for him but he threaten Kim with knifelike claws. Kim slams her elbow into his gu  96. The CHAI flies from his hands, lands at her feet. She @ropkicks it to Steve. The demon in Chi rises up, horribl threatening...

dialogues.speaker: CHI LUNG
dialogues.text: Give me that jade... Steve slams the third piece into place and makes the comp

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Go to Hell!

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: As you wish.

dialogues.speaker: FROM THE JADE
dialogues.text: LIKE A SPEAR THROUGH HIS SOLAR PLEXIS. He's rocketed up. Below, a hole opens.

dialogues.speaker: THE ENTRANCE TO HELL
dialogues.text: Chi Lung is swept in and plunges down... screaming all th way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all look down into the chasm. When the dust clears, there is no sign of Chi Lung. There are only bits of clot floating up from the hole. Brad picks up the CHAI TAO, studies it. Yen Lo looks on complaisantly.

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: Never liked that guy. Kim runs to the fallen Steve. She drops to him.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: No. It can't be.

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: The decision of the judges is final.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: No. Please. You must return him to me!

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: Impossible. She grabs the Chai Tao from Brad, points it at Yen Lo.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: The Chai Tao. I can make a wish, right?

dialogues.speaker: YEN LO
dialogues.text: That is correct. She slams the pieces together. POP! A BEAM shoots. Virgin souls suck back into their bodies. Flame Lords revert fro demons to punks. The Judges disappear.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I now wish all those who are pure in heart remain... Everyone else can go to Hell!! The air BURSTS, the WIND WHIPS fiercely. The White Heart drop back, shielding their eyes. The dust settles, Kim stands with Steve at her side. Egg is there with the virgins. Yen Lo vanishes.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: {to virgins) You know I really didn't think that would work.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I... believed... She and Steve are looking deeply into each other's eyes.. getting lost... Egg Shen prattles on...

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: You are very impressive for an... American.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Thanks. Steve suddenly notices a lifeless body.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Bobby...

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: He fought Chi.

dialogues.speaker: DOUBLE
dialogues.text: And possibly saved his soul.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Aw, you know... He wasn't so bad. He shouldn't go to hell. The Chai Tao glows in Kim's hand. It radiates a greenish/white light.

dialogues.speaker: EGG
dialogues.text: I think Yen Lo heard you. Bobby's soul will be at peace.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: I don’t get it.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: (ironic) It's because we Chinese are inscrutable.  They kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The KISS continues. 99.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I don't know, I find you highly scrutable.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: You're kind of interesting yourself...in a goyish way.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: I'm just trying to learn...

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: That's admirable, Grasshopper. Now, If you just cut out those one liners. I may take you on.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: As your partner?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Apprentice. We must now search for three new guardians for the Chai Tao.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: We've got one right here.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Not me, I've got my own career.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: You sure I can't change your mind?

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: You can try. A little of that old black magic...

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Thought you didn't believe in that...

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: Convince me...

dialogues.speaker: IN FRONT OF EGG'S SHOP
dialogues.text: Then Kim breaks. Clarence walks out of Egg's shop, hands Steve a cellular phone. Egg, Brad and Double stand in the B.G..  100.

dialogues.speaker: CLARENCE
dialogues.text: He's still yelling. You better take it.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Yeah, Dad, the jade... It's lost...yep, sorry. No way to get it back. Well, Sorry you feel like that. But I'm afraid that jade is gone for good. He winces at a LOUD BLAST as the phone is slammed down...

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Oh, and say hello to Mom.

dialogues.speaker: CLARENCE
dialogues.text: He's kinda mad at you. Maybe you should stay in Little China... it's a lot quieter than out there... Clarence, gets in his car, winks at him and pulls away. S turns to him.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: I'll see you again.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: And I'll see you. Kim climbs into the truck with Brad.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Take care of her.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: I don't think she needs my help. Brad offers his hand. Rivalry exists, but also friendship Kim hands Steve the piece of Jade. He fits the pieces together to form the complete CHAI TAO, but Egg takes the

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: They must stay separate, Grasshopper. It's better that way. He hands Steve the single museum piece.  101.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: See if you can take better care of this.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Really?! You mean that?

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Yes, my apprentice... I do.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: We both will... okay? Egg gives the second piece to Kim.

dialogues.speaker: EGG SHEN
dialogues.text: Okay. (turns to Brad) But the secret must stay hidden. It's better that we forget about this. Egg makes a quick magical motion. Something comes over Br

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Forget about what? Steve puts his arm around Egg's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Louie, I think this is the start of a beautiful... (looks at Egg. A beat.) ....uh... apprenticeship. Egg laughs. They walk off arm in arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kim drives away. Brad pulls out a beer.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: You know... everyone talks about Chinese magic and stuff. I don't believe any of it, do you Kim.

dialogues.speaker: KIM
dialogues.text: No, Brad... not a word.  w oO nN Popping off the lid, Brad tilts his head back to drink. Green smoke rises out of the bottle as he raises it to hi mouth. Kim starts to warn him as we.....- ZOOM UP AND AWAY...FROM BIG TROUBLE...
